name: JBoss BPM Suite & JBoss Fuse Integration Demo
summary:
Demo based on JBoss BPM Suite and JBoss Fuse products to highlight a few of the more common use cases, call a BPM
process from a fuse camel route. Install options - local and containerized.
author: Christina Lin, Andrew Block, Eric D. Schabell
targetProduct: JBoss BPM Suite and JBoss Fuse
